tag_professor: Gives good feedback (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: Dog-eat-dog mentality, will hand you \'L\'s in front of the whole class and gives you more assignments than you can possibly hope to finish. She also made us read and respond to all these 60pg articles and have hour long discussions that cut in on painting time. Basically, a mom that you try to strive for her approval but will never ever ever get.

stu_tags: GRADED BY FEW THINGS  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: She thinks critically about art and expects you to as well, which is positive. She has a hard time giving clear criteria for grading.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: Work hard, come to class, work outside of class, and don\'t be afraid to talk to her about your ideas and struggles. She is a very confident woman and doesn\'t like excuses. If you\'re looking for a relaxing art class don\'t sign on for Cynthia, but if you want to see your art grow exponentially she is the one to take.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: This lady is hard but fair. She will make you work but it is worth it because she is awesome and super hot. Seriously.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: Cynthia will push you within an inch of your sanity. She will make you stretch yourself in your abilities. In her class you learn to dig deep into your passion and push it to the limits. I love being in her classes. She has taught me so much and it is professors like who help students achieve great things. Don\'t be lazy work hard and take her class

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: This course was a LOT of work, but I also was able to become a MUCH better painter by the end of the class. The professor is very clear and cares that her students learn and improve. The first two projects were tedious but useful, and the third was more creative. I would take her class again, but not at the same time as other difficult classes.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: She picks favorites and then compares other students to them. If she doesn?t like you, your grades will show it. Horribly unapproachable. Even in her intro classes she expects you to know how to do everything. You are on your own in her classes so expect to teach yourself. Don?t take the abuse, skip on her classes.
